    • Constructor Detail

      • Robot

        public Robot(ISummit startSummit,
             IEdge nextEdge,
             ChatChannel chat,
             Main main,
             int idRobot)
        Constructor. At the beginning, the robot is placed on a summit, moving to nextEdge if nextEdge is not null, or to a random end of the current summit otherwise
        Parameters:
        startSummit: - the summit where the robot has been placed to start
        nextEdge: - the edge where the robot has to go (put null to have a random nextEdge)
        chat: - the chat channel shared with other robots
        main: - the link with graphical objects (used to represent the robot moves)
        idRobot: - the code name of the robot

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        This is the main method of a robot. It is used to make it think and move.
